name: I.D. RESTART
description:
First Game Jam!

Entry for Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam

I.D. RESTART

----------------------

Collect the screws to discover the 3 different endings and discover the lore! Be careful because collecting the key will rewind the factory. Maybe you should collect the screws after collecting the key?

Big thanks to @n3.m0_ for drawing most of the art!

Follow him on INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/n3.m0__/
